system.description:
You have found a minor object of power, and it has taken a shine to you. You gain the following benefits:

  • When you take this feat, you acquire a simple melee weapon, an individual armor piece like a gauntlet or pauldron (which can be worn with any other armor you may wear), or a magical focus like a wand or crystal ball that is a minor artifact and is bonded to you. For the purpose of qualifying for artifact whispers, if you chose a weapon, it counts as a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.uga2gmf3559332tw]{Weapon of Power}, if you chose a spellcasting focus, it counts as @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.00ein6jo2oc0asex]{Font of Power}, and if you chose the single armor piece, it counts as an @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.l97xnqcpxnc12jpo]{Armor of Power}. It is indestructible, has two artifact charges, and has traits as indicated below:

    • If your lesser artifact is a weapon, it deals additional force damage equal to half your proficiency modifier the first time you strike with it each turn.

    • If your lesser artifact is a piece of armor, it reduces the first instance of non-magical bludgeoning, slashing, or piercing damage you take each turn by half your proficiency bonus.

    • If your lesser artifact is a magical focus, it can be used with any spellcasting class you possess, and you gain an expertise die on checks to maintain your concentration.

    • If your selected artifact whisper would normally add a spell to a character’s wielder list, you can add it to the spells known or class list of a spellcasting class you have levels in. If you do not have any spellcasting class levels, you still learn it, but can only cast the spell with your artifact charges from this feat. 

  • You gain a single artifact whisper of your choice from the wielder class. You must meet any prerequisites the whisper has to select it.

  • If you have levels in wielder, you do not count as having two types of bonded artifact for the purpose of selecting relic arts and artifact whispers granted by your class levels; those must reference your Bonded Artifact.
